decisions.name: Copy_1_of_Is_this_fulfilment_for_an_employer
decisions.label: Is this fulfilment for an employer?

decisions.name: Is_this_an_employer_f_type
decisions.label: Is this an employer f type?

decisions.name: Is_this_fulfilment_for_an_employer
decisions.label: Is this fulfilment for an employer?

Flow.description: Screen flow to walk specialists through converting v2 fulfilment to v3

formulas.name: auditLogdefault
formulas.expression: "This fulfilment record was created to supersede this one: https://octopuswealth.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Fulfillment__c/" + {!Loop_1_Create_new_fulfilment.Id}+ "/view"

formulas.name: paymentStatusDefault
recStatusDefault
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL({!Loop2_Create_new_recommendations_and_fulfilments.Status__c}, "Not taken up"), "Declined", IF( ISPICKVAL({!Loop2_Create_new_recommendations_and_fulfilments.Status__c}, "Awaiting suitability outcome"), "Awaiting decision", IF( ISPICKVAL({!Loop2_Create_new_recommendations_and_fulfilments.Status__c}, "Cancelled"), "Cancelled", "Accepted")))

formulas.name: recTypeRefName
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!Loop2_Create_new_recommendations_and_fulfilments.Advice_Type__c}, "Lump Sum"), "LUMP_SUM", IF( CONTAINS({!Loop2_Create_new_recommendations_and_fulfilments.Advice_Type__c}, "Transfer") && (CONTAINS({!Loop2_Create_new_recommendations_and_fulfilments.Name}, "BED") || CONTAINS({!Loop2_Create_new_recommendations_and_fulfilments.Name}, "Bed")),"INTERNAL_TRANSFER", IF( CONTAINS({!Loop2_Create_new_recommendations_and_fulfilments.Advice_Type__c}, "Transfer"), "EXTERNAL_TRANSFER_IN", IF( ISPICKVAL({!Loop2_Create_new_recommendations_and_fulfilments.Checklist_Type__c}, "Investment mandate"), "REBALANCE","PORTFOLIO_SWITCH"))))

formulas.name: statusDefault
formulas.expression: CASE( {!Loop_1_Create_new_fulfilment.Status__c}, "On hold", "Awaiting pre-requisites", "Submit forms", "Submit fulfilment", "Awaiting provider action", "Chase provider", "Chasing transfer (within SLA)", "Chase transfer","Chasing transfer (outside SLA)", "Chase transfer", "Investment Checks", "Investment checks", "Finalise fulfilment","Investment checks", "Awaiting client payment","Chase client payment","Cancelled","Cancelled","Complete","Complete","")

formulas.name: statusDefaultV1
formulas.expression: CASE( {!Loop2_Create_new_recommendations_and_fulfilments.Status__c}, "On hold", "Awaiting pre-requisites", "Submit forms", "Submit fulfilment", "Awaiting provider action", "Chase provider", "Chasing transfer (within SLA)", "Chase transfer","Chasing transfer (outside SLA)", "Chase transfer", "Investment Checks", "Investment checks", "Finalise fulfilment","Investment checks", "Awaiting client payment","Chase client payment","Cancelled","Cancelled","Complete","Complete","")

Flow.interviewLabel: Advice | Convert old fulfilment to v3 {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Advice | Convert old fulfilment to v3

loops.name: Loop2_Create_new_recommendations_and_fulfilments
loops.label: Loop 2 | Create new recommendations and fulfilments

fields.name: progresstext
fields.fieldText: Once you've updated this piece of fulfilment, you have {!count} v2 left to go through.

fields.name: countTextv1
fields.fieldText: After this piece of fulfilment you have {!countv1} of v1 left to go through.

fields.name: explaintext
fields.fieldText:
Welcome to the fulfilment-updatathon!


There are {!count} items of version 2 and {!countv1} items of version 1 fulfilment to be converted to version 3.

You'll be shown each one individually, and you can stop and come back to this in the future if you want, and any you've already done will be saved.


If you have questions, or are unsure of anything, please do just let Harriet know.
